Reviews.Title: “Great location for PNE and Coliseum Concerts”
Reviews.Author: NottinghamBabe
Reviews.Content: booked hotel advance overnight stay 4 friends johnny reid concert 15 minutes walk found staff helpful friendly 3 king sized fridge microwave modern screen tv free wifi preferred 3 book advance 3rd floor complimentary wholesome fresh breakfast service hotel available 6 10am limited table space plan ahead clean comfy beds lot restaurants close easy taxi 5 10 min ride ate walk free parking easy access 1 canada freeway north vancouver via bridge easy bus access wd stay location concerts fair

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value”
Reviews.Author: daveobee
Reviews.Content: easy access freeway clean free wifi free parking free breakfast spacious friendly staff bed couple restaurants walking distance price bargain tough nice price vancouver qualifies

Reviews.Title: “good beds, clean, and good breakfast”
Reviews.Author: Canada-Martin
Reviews.Content: booked additional parking mini utility trailer pleasantly surprised offered minutes downtown public transportation stops front hotel matresses fridge tv coffeemaker clean daily cleaned properly towels changed shower soap etc etc continental breakfast included 2 steps called hot buffet coffee european background staff extremely friendly helpfull ali recommend hotel stay accomodation vancouver mk ab

Reviews.Title: “More than I expected for less than I expected”
Reviews.Author: Highlander0
Reviews.Content: hotel easy walk park getting hotel wary front desk looked nice aged obvious lots renovations parking included isnt vancouver price reasonable 90 tax night expected clean carpeting beautiful tv 37 hdtv clean crisp sheets comfy duvet seats table bathroom looked brand complaints service price free breakfast lot ive seen hotels picture hallways elevator ice machine age running condition car safe parked lot outside front door desk manned 24hrs odd smells sounds easy forget youre major highways simply cant hear traffic theres free computer printer lobby nice perk ill staying im

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to stay and Great rate for Vancouver”
Reviews.Author: Travelguy43
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 3 days stayed larger queen beds seperated batheroom reviewers spoke larger pullout bed fridge coffee maker microwave hotel street bothered street noise solid brick building sound proof staff hotel friendly found free breakfast ate breakfast evey morning 4 kids deal hall lights makes hallway dark makes hotel feel cheap hotel atmosphere improve greatly brighter lights clean beds comfortable sleep hotel quiet overall hear guests appear people staying time mcdonalds accross street sushi resturant couple blocks hotel east hastings street east hastings heard 15 blocks west walked night safe major bus loop block sky train station awaya short bus ride stated 5 star hotel clean stay prices

Reviews.Title: “This place STINKS, if you don't smoke, DON'T STAY HERE”
Reviews.Author: SallyLorraine
Reviews.Content: traveled teenage daughter vancouver olympics booked establishment called twice confirm nonsmoking athletes hate smell stale smoke arrived lobby smelled bad smelled ashtray disgusting daughter burst tears stay fortunately local business owner heard situation eating lunch return ran nonsmoking decided change stickers door trust western
